name: Tab-Box
description: A single content area with multiple panels, each associated with a header in a list.

name: Accordion
description: An accordion (or accordion menu) is a grouped set of collapsible panels that provides access to a large number of links or other selectable items in a constrained space.

name: Carousel
description: When presenting a set of pictorial objects with limited screen real estate to accommodate all items at once. Planning the items order, providing different means for scrolling and communicating clearly the visual element in focus are essential for a successful use of this component.
